item.description:
Clean up and restore this historic greater Boston climbing destination to a more attractive and useful condition. After a summer of hard use by climbers, the general public, and especially the less than environmentally conscious  local  youth there will be much to pick up and put back in place. Meet at Quincy Quarries at 9:30am. Lunch will be provided and climbing for the remainder of the afternoon will be encouraged. REI will be involved and have a presence there, as well as the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation, members of the Mountaineering Committee of the Boston Chapter of the AMC, local rock climbers and of course our Meetup. 

Please register for the event through REI here: http://www.rei.com/event/29779/session/37003  

Registration will help getting a handle on the number of volunteers plus it will get you a free T-shirt from REI (while supplies last...).

Quincy Quarries can be found at  93 Ricciuti Dr., Quincy, MA
item.name: Quincy Quarries Adopt-a-Crag
